description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Reborn again from the ashes you take control of John as he awakens for the first time in his new robotic body. He immediately realizes that there is a problem. John is stuck in a arena and must fight his way through countless numbers of foe's to earn his freedom and his new life
